name: Arcade Shooter: Sky Fighting W
description:
Arcade Shooter: Sky Fighting WWII is an editor's choice award winning 2D scroller shooting game with sleek graphics and smooth gameplay.
FEATURES:
Simple to play to kill time, but very challenging to master
Suitable for both casual and hardcore shoot 'em up gamers
No internet connection required! Play game offline anytime you want
Nostalgia of 2D vertical scroller arcade shooter that dominated the 80s and 90s
Collect and evolve over 100 cool monsters with unique abilites
